hero.beginningDescription: Design. Vision. The first line drawn on the map of Addis Ababa.
hero.endDescription: Build. Reality. The final brick cemented with precision.

philosophy.title: The Visionary Alphabet
philosophy.description: The name 'Ke Ha Eske Pe' (ከሀ እስከ ፐ) signifies the complete Amharic alphabet. It represents our core notion: bridging the gap between design and construction to ensure your vision remains uncompromised from the first letter to the last.

bridging.title: Bridging The Fragmentation
bridging.description: In traditional projects, design and construction are often handled by separate entities. This fragmentation frequently leads to miscommunication, budget overruns, and undesired outputs that deviate from the original intent.

accountability.title: Single-Point Accountability
accountability.description: We serve as your single contract point. By overseeing everything from the initial design stage through heavy construction and final furnishing, we eliminate friction and guarantee the quality of the final result.

paperToGround.label: From Paper To Ground
paperToGround.description: Our primary mission is to ensure that every stroke on the blueprint is translated with absolute fidelity onto the physical site. We don't just design; we deliver the reality exactly as it was envisioned.
paperToGround.quote: Ensuring what is on the paper is perfectly delivered on the ground.

works.title: OUR WORK
works.description: From initial design to final finishing. We deliver complete, end-to-end building solutions. Browse our work by category.

cta.headline: Ready to translate your vision into reality?

footer.tagline: Design in Addis Ababa. Built for Eternity.

exterior.label: Exterior Designs
exterior.description: Facade designs, outdoor landscaping, and external architectural elements.

interior.label: Interior Designs
interior.description: Space planning, room layouts, and interior styling for residential and commercial spaces.

construction.label: Construction
construction.description: New builds, structural work, and ground-up construction projects.

finishing.label: Finishing Work
finishing.description: Flooring, painting, trim work, and final installation details.

renovation.label: Renovation
renovation.description: Remodeling, restoration, and upgrades to existing buildings and spaces.

about.heroDescription: The name 'Ke Ha Eske Pe' (ከሀ እስከ ፐ) signifies the complete Amharic alphabet. It represents our core notion: bridging the gap between design and construction to ensure your vision remains uncompromised from the first letter to the last.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To redefine the construction landscape in Ethiopia by providing a seamless, integrated design-build experience that prioritizes architectural integrity above all else.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the benchmark for contemporary Ethiopian architecture, creating spaces that honor tradition while embracing modern engineering.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: In architecture, a single millimeter matters. We obsess over the details.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: What we promise in the 3D render is what we deliver on the ground.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Utilizing modern tech to help clients visualize before the first stone.

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.description: We take full responsibility from the first sketch to the final key handover.

architectural.title: Architectural Design
architectural.description: From conceptual sketches to detailed blueprints, we design buildings that breathe.

interior.title: Interior Architecture
interior.description: Crafting atmospheric interiors that blend functionality with high-end aesthetics.

construction.title: General Construction
construction.description: Heavy construction managed with structural rigor and expert craftsmanship.

management.title: Project Management
management.description: Full lifecycle oversight ensuring timelines and budgets are strictly respected.

metadata.title: Ke Ha Eske Pe Design And Build
metadata.description: Ke Ha Eske Pe Design and Build - From design to construction, we deliver your vision with precision.

success.title: Message Sent Successfully!
success.description: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
